full_address: Lot 7/41-43 Manitzky Road, Tamborine Mountain, Qld 4272
description:
Perfectly positioned in the exclusive Blue Wing Estate, this prime softly elevated 5.3 acre allotment is your golden chance to secure a blue-chip piece of beautiful Tamborine Mountain.

Serviced by a sealed driveway, on-site power, a freshwater bore and rich fertile soil; this whisper-quiet premium hobby farm site offers unparalleled privacy fringed by rainforest national park.

Lot 7 features –

- 21,560 m2 of prime gently elevated land

- One of only 4 exclusive acreage Lots

- Power, drinkable bore water and bitumen driveway

- Lovely views, flood free, all-day breezes and private avocado orchard

- Only minutes to local IGA, coffee shops and the picturesque Tamborine Mountain village

- Just a short drive to the stunning beaches of Surfers Paradise

- Simply bring your imagination, and build your dream getaway today

The perfect hinterland haven, the boutique Blue Wing Estate is situated an easy drive to Gold Coast city and offers a lush and peaceful getaway for sustainable hobby farming, entertaining and recreational space for all of the family to enjoy. Do not miss this limited opportunity.

Disclaimer: Whilst every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these details, no warranty is given by the vendor, the agent or Amir Prestige Group as to their accuracy. Interested parties should not rely on this information as representations of fact, but must instead satisfy themselves by inspection or otherwise.
